title: Extreme Client Lag.
body:
I've been having this problem for a while now, the client is laggy beyond reason. I've tried reinstalling, repatching, using low-spec mode... I hear my friends talking about enemy champion selections about 20 seconds before I even see the loading screen. It's ridiculous, I've seen a bunch of other people with this same issue and haven't seen ANY fixes.

I'm using Windows 10 with a gtx 1060, 2.6ghz CPU and 16G RAM
